sentence: My one objection is that I don’t think such an amendment is necessary.

meaning: โอกาส

sentence: Circumstances had obliged him to sell the business.

meaning: พัสดุ

sentence: We decided to make the arrangement permanent.

sentence: The aim was to maximize the machine’s productive capacity.

meaning: ข้อห้าม, การห้าม
